mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dump_record WHERE exact_date between #{start} and #{end}

select predictAmount, a.siteName, a.carNumber, todayAmount from ( SELECT SUM(net_weight) DIV 7 as predictAmount, site_name as siteName, car_number as carNumber from dump_record dr WHERE `day` BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 day) and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 day) and TIME(exact_date) BETWEEN #{timeStart} and #{timeEnd} group by site_name, car_number ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(net_weight) as todayAmount, site_name as siteName, car_number as carNumber from dump_record dr WHERE exact_date BETWEEN #{dateTimeStart} and #{dateTimeEnd} GROUP by site_name, car_number ) b on a.siteName = b.siteName and a.carNumber = b.carNumber

select a.site_name as siteName, a.predict, b.actual from ( SELECT COUNT(1) div 7 as predict, site_name from dump_record dr WHERE `day` BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 day) and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 day) and TIME(exact_date) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURTIME(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) and CURTIME() group by site_name ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(1) as actual, site_name from dump_record dr WHERE `day` = CURDATE() and TIME(exact_date) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURTIME(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) and CURTIME() group by site_name ) b on a.site_name = b.site_name
